mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_no, e.position_no, e.employee_name, e.employee_phone, p.position_no, p.position_name, d.department_no, d.department_name, ea.employee_password, ea.password_updated_at, p.position_name_english AS positionNameEnglish FROM public.employee_auth ea JOIN public.employee e ON ea.employee_no = e.employee_no JOIN public.position p ON e.position_no = p.position_no join department d on e.department_no = d.department_no WHERE e.employee_no = #{employeeNo};
SELECT m.menu_no FROM public.department_menu dm JOIN public.menu m ON dm.menu_no = m.menu_no JOIN public.employee e ON dm.department_no = e.department_no WHERE e.employee_no = #{employeeNo};
